Hero.title: Drexfy Visa – Your <important>Gateway to a Digital Nomad Life</important> in Portugal
Hero.description: Welcome to Drexfy Visa, your partner in making your relocation to Portugal smooth, efficient, and stress-free. Combining cutting-edge AI technology with experienced legal professionals, we offer personalized visa solutions tailored specifically for digital nomads, tech entrepreneurs, and creative professionals.

Pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing
Pricing.description: We believe Drexfy should be accessible to all companies, no matter the size.
Pricing.contact_us_description: Need a custom plan? Contact us for more information.
Pricing.section_title: Choose the Right Visa for Your Lifestyle
Pricing.section_description: Select the visa type that best suits your situation. All packages include our comprehensive support services.

Features.section_subtitle: Simplified Visas and Relocation Solutions for Digital Professionals
Features.section_description: Portugal has rapidly become one of Europe's most attractive destinations for international talent, known for its welcoming culture, pleasant climate, and innovative business environment. Drexfy Visa helps you seamlessly integrate into this vibrant community.

HomeFAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
HomeFAQ.question1: What types of visas does Drexfy Visa support?
HomeFAQ.answer1: Drexfy Visa specializes in Digital Nomad Visas, Entrepreneur Visas, and Creative Professional Visas for Portugal. We provide comprehensive support for each visa type, tailored to your specific situation.
HomeFAQ.question2: How long does the visa process typically take?
HomeFAQ.answer2: The visa process typically takes 2-3 months from application to approval. Our streamlined process helps minimize delays and ensures all documentation is properly prepared.
HomeFAQ.question3: Can I apply remotely through Drexfy Visa?
HomeFAQ.answer3: Yes, our entire application process can be completed remotely. We handle all interactions with Portuguese authorities on your behalf, making it possible to secure your visa without traveling to Portugal until approval.
HomeFAQ.question4: What makes Drexfy Visa different from other services?
HomeFAQ.answer4: Drexfy Visa combines AI-powered document processing with experienced legal professionals to provide a faster, more accurate, and personalized visa application experience. Our success rate and dedicated support team set us apart from traditional visa services.

CTA.title: Ready to Start Your Portugal Journey?
CTA.description: Take the first step toward your new life in Portugal. Our team is ready to guide you through every stage of the visa application process.

VisaApplication.accommodation_address_description: Provide the full address where you will be staying during your visit.
VisaApplication.passport_scan_description: Upload a clear scan of your passport's information page.
VisaApplication.photo_id_description: Upload a recent passport-sized photo (3.5 x 4.5 cm).
VisaApplication.proof_of_accommodation_description: Upload hotel reservation or invitation letter.
VisaApplication.financial_proof_description: Upload bank statements or sponsorship letter.
VisaApplication.enrollment_proof_description: Upload proof of enrollment from your educational institution.
VisaApplication.employment_contract_description: Upload your employment contract or work offer.
VisaApplication.family_relationship_proof_description: Upload documents proving your family relationship (birth certificate, marriage certificate, etc.).
VisaApplication.terms_and_conditions_text: By submitting this application, I confirm that all the information provided is true and complete. I understand that providing false information may result in the rejection of my visa application and may affect future applications.
